alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Franklin; Union (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 8:06PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FRANKLIN COUNTY IN SOUTHEASTERN INDIANA, SOUTHWESTERN UNION AND SOUTHERN FAYETTE COUNTIES IN EAST CENTRAL INDIANA THROUGH 845 PM EDT... At 805 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Glenwood, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Connersville, Brookville, Blooming Grove, Columbia, Metamora, Bunker Hill, Laurel, Cedar Grove, Mount Carmel, Andersonville, Mounds State Recreation Area, Alpine, Mixersville, Nulltown, Sharptown and Everton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
